vista.set
Class DataReferenceFilter

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.DataReferenceFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Enumeration<DataReference>
public class DataReferenceFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Enumeration<DataReference>

Uses a regular expression to filter a group of pathnames. It defines either Perl5 or Awk Expressions

Constructor Summary
DataReferenceFilter(DataReference[] refs, Predicate<DataReference> predicate)
          Iterates over an array of data references using a filter as defined by regex
